reviewText: It's a pretty good movie for after 2 AM and more than a bottle.
ok this is a cinemax  after dark movie meaning little storyline lots of T&A

The reason people watch a film like this is for the girls in bikinis and to see the main female characters get nude with assorted other characters either nude or in bikinis. Check.
The main characters each get nude and topless multiple times. Sadly, if the main characters aren't attractive to you, then the movie is a chore to watch. That happened to me.  With these characters, romantic scenes weren't intriguing at all.  Don't know how to explain it, but I'll try.

The 3-sec clips for the romantic scenes were highly distracting. The editing is much too quick.  Interlacing 2 different couples romantic scenes with very different stories together is also highly distracting. Stop it already.  And bikini shots that don't show faces? What's with that?

Either BS-1 or BS-2 are better entertainment.
None are in the class of Bikini Carwash or South Beach Academy for the female roles, sadly.

So - check the 3 main female characters BEFORE watching this movie to see if they are attractive to you. If not, skip it. Wish that I had.
excellent movie just as i remembered, classic just like the other 2 bikini summers . no 2 is harder to find because it'rare
If You Like Bikini Summer 1 And 2 You Will Like Bikini Summer 3 : South Beach Heat,Some Good Topless Scenes,The Story Is Not Too Bad..
This is another good installement of the "Biniki Summer" series. If you liked the first two you will like this one also.
